targets.query: SELECT difference(mean("last")) / (mean("last") - difference(mean("last"))) FROM ticker WHERE ("currency" =~ /^$coin_type$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m)
SELECT difference(mean("last")) / (mean("last") - difference(mean("last"))) FROM ticker WHERE ("currency" =~ /^$coin_type$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10m)
SELECT difference(mean("last")) / (mean("last") - difference(mean("last"))) FROM ticker WHERE ("currency" =~ /^$coin_type$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(15m)
SELECT difference(mean("last")) / (mean("last") - difference(mean("last"))) FROM ticker WHERE ("currency" =~ /^$coin_type$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30m)
SELECT difference(mean("last")) / (mean("last") - difference(mean("last"))) FROM ticker WHERE ("currency" =~ /^$coin_type$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h)
SELECT difference(mean("last")) / (mean("last") - difference(mean("last"))) FROM ticker WHERE ("currency" =~ /^$coin_type$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(2h)
SELECT mean("last") FROM "ticker" WHERE ("currency" =~ /^$coin_type$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m) fill(null)
SELECT difference(mean("last")) / (mean("last") - difference(mean("last"))) FROM ticker WHERE ("currency" =~ /^$coin_type$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m)
SELECT non_negative_difference(mean("last")) / (mean("last") - difference(mean("last"))) FROM ticker WHERE ("currency" =~ /^$coin_type$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m)
SELECT mean("price") FROM /^$coin_type$/ WHERE ("crx" = 'bithumb') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)
SELECT difference(mean("last")) / (mean("last") - difference(mean("last"))) FROM ticker WHERE ("currency" =~ /^$coin_type$/) AND ("xchg" = 'bithumb') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)
SELECT difference(mean("last")) / (mean("last") - difference(mean("last"))) FROM ticker WHERE ("currency" =~ /^$coin_type$/) AND ("xchg" = 'coinone') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)

list.label: Coin
list.name: coin_type
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "ticker" WITH KEY = "currency"
